about_the_game:
You Are an Egg

Or a creature controlling it, striving to crush its opponents in a fierce battle for the entertainment of the public. Thanks to various mechanics and abilities, the egg fight looks truly spectacular.

Stay Alive

It's the only thing to watch out for, but not the only abilities and weapons are aimed at adhering to this rule. Use them to gain an advantage over the opponent!

Call Friends and Play Together

You can play with random players or team up with your friends! Or if you want to test your skills, fight against everyone at once.

One Egg, Infinite Possibilities

Many game modes where you can choose the one that suits you best, or earn more in-game currency to buy unique items or new eggs for your game.

Decks of Abilities and Rankings

In large quantities, they will allow you to play out various situations and different tactics, combining ability mechanics with weapon techniques for destruction. Find a suitable opponent with strength comparable to your play style in ranked mode.

This game is about

Competitions with friends or random people on the egg battlefield. You have to use abilities and weapons in combinations that will help you win. But this is not such a simple task; not all abilities or weapons allow you to instantly destroy the enemy. Depending on your playstyle, you can achieve victory in different ways and combinations, whether you want to first set the enemy on fire and make him vulnerable to physical collisions, or you want to freeze him to death, or wait for the moment for a huge gun from the sky to crush him. You can increase your arsenal through the store by spending the money you earn in battles and fight with opponents of equal strength of your rating.
The fun paths combined with the different cards and egg abilities create endless possibilities for using them in battle. Can you curb them all?

name: EGG Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 650M / Radeon R9 M375
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and up
  • Processor: 4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1060 TI or higher graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: "EGG Arena" is a game where players battle each other in the role of an egg. Using various skills and strategies, players compete against each other to defeat their opponents and enjoy the thrilling gaming experience.
